text: Let’s get started. I’m looking forward to listening and learning from our partners and policymakers in India as we work together to build a thoughtful crypto regulatory framework. https://twitter.com/coinbaseindia/status/1511932012180824064 <!--1511941993827500044-->

Understatement of the year: crypto is having its moment with policymakers all over the world. Curious what it's like to  #LiveCrypto  on our Policy team at  @coinbase  ? Hermine shares how we do policy our unique way here.  https://lnkd.in/gUP3AtbJ  Join us! https//lnkd.in/g25FSn69 <!--1502310717570961409-->
As we grow and offer services in new markets, the number of legitimate information requests we receive grows, too. Going forward, we'll publish these annually. <!--1471211634559356934-->

Our goal with these reports is to keep all our stakeholders informed about requests for customer information we receive from government and law enforcement agencies — how many we’ve received, where they come from, and our approach in responding to them. <!--1471211633452072961-->
The number of requests we received in the first three quarters of this year represents a ~27% increase from the total number of requests we received in all of 2020. <!--1471211632323817472-->

Key highlights: ~We received a total of 5,562 requests in Q1-Q3 '21. Roughly 51% of those requests came from outside the US. ~84% of requests were from the US, UK and Germany. ~We got first time requests in 2021 from Latvia, Greece, India, Turkey, Bosnia, Hungary and Russia. <!--1471211631107473410-->

@coinbase  is proud to publish our third Transparency Report. This report covers between Jan. 1 -- Sep. 30, 2021. https://blog.coinbase.com/transparency-at-coinbase-c8edf6dce4d6 <!--1471211629844959234-->
